name: AVCaptureDevice.WhiteBalanceChromaticityValues
desc: Structure containing CIE 1931 xy chromaticity values.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a structure for white balance chromaticity values.

items.name: init(x: Float, y: Float)
items.desc: Creates a structure for white balance chromaticity values from its x and y coordinates.

items.name: var x: Float
items.desc: The x component of the CIE 1931 chromacticity value.

items.name: var y: Float
items.desc: The y component of the CIE 1931 chromacticity value.
